intro: <0>Scanners<1>Scanners are Genshin tools that can automatically scan game data from screenshots or directly from the game.<2>Below are several scanners that have been tested with GO.<3>To upload the exported file, go to <1>Settings page and upload your file in the Database Upload section.
tosWarn: As any tools that indirectly interact with the game, although their usage is virtually undetectable, <1>there could still be risk with using them.</1> User discretion is advised.

nb.title: Artiscan
nb.p1: This web-based scanner can capture your game window, scan from a screenshot, or scan from a video. The screenshot/video capture can be fullscreen and does not need to be cropped.
nb.p2: Mobile/PlayStation can only be scanned from screenshots or video.

ik.title: Inventory Kamera
ik.p1: This light-weight app will scan all the characters, weapons and artifacts in your inventory. Follow the instructions in the app to set it up.

as.title: AdeptiScanner
as.p1: Scans all artifacts in your inventory. Has a manual scanning mode.
as.p2: This scanner can also be configured for new artifacts in new game versions without needing an update.

am.title: 「天目」— Amenoma
am.p1: Scans all you artifacts in your inventory. Follow the instructions to capture the window and scan. Has both Chinese and English versions (download the <1>_EN.exe</1> version to scan in English). GO only accepts the <1>GOOD</1> format.

ak.title: Akasha Scanner
ak.p1: Automatically scans artifacts as well as characters and weapons. Allows exporting of past scans as it keeps a history within the app. Scans only in English.
ak.p2: This app is also able to scan achievements for <1>Paimon.moe</1> and <1>Seelie.me</1>.

goodeng: This app only scans in English and exports to <1>GOOD</1> format.
seelieme: This app can also scan materials for <1>Seelie.me</1>
